title: Arnaud De Lie Wins Sprint with One Leg: ‘I Prefer to Sprint with Two Legs’
content:
The Lotto-Dstny speedster opened up his kick with such ferocity that he broke his right pedal and his foot clipped out with 50m to go, but he won anyway.

Read the full article at Arnaud De Lie Wins Sprint with One Leg: ‘I Prefer to Sprint with Two Legs’ on Velo.
author: ahood
